# R2
S3_PROVIDER=r2
S3_BUCKET=mixtli-pro-bucket
S3_REGION=auto
S3_ENDPOINT=https://<TU_ACCOUNT_ID>.r2.cloudflarestorage.com
S3_ACCESS_KEY_ID=...
S3_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY=...
S3_FORCE_PATH_STYLE=true
